languages.text: Дерево проросло прямо из человека — его изломанные кости стали основаниями ветвей, расколотый череп врос в основание, а высохшее кровавое месиво покрывает кожистую "кору" тонким слоем.

traits.locale_text: Дерево проросло прямо из человека — его изломанные кости стали основаниями ветвей, расколотый череп врос в основание, а высохшее кровавое месиво покрывается кожистую "кору" тонким слоем.

languages.text: This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.
languages.original_text: Дерево проросло прямо из человека — его изломанные кости стали основаниями ветвей, расколотый череп врос в основание, а высохшее кровавое месиво покрывает кожистую "кору" тонким слоем.

traits.locale_text: This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

languages.text: 这棵树是从某个人的身体中长出来的。他被折断的骨头形成了树枝，破碎的头骨与树干融为一体，干涸的血迹薄薄地覆盖在皮肤一样的树皮上。
languages.original_text: This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

traits.locale_text: 这棵树是从某个人的身体中长出来的。他被折断的骨头形成了树枝，破碎的头骨与树干融为一体，干涸的血迹薄薄地覆盖在皮肤一样的树皮上。

languages.text: Este árbol brota directamente de una persona. Sus huesos rotos forman la base de las ramas, su cráneo, agrietado, está incrustado en el tronco y una fina capa de sangre seca cubre una corteza muy parecida a la piel.
languages.original_text: This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

traits.locale_text: Este árbol brota directamente de una persona. Sus huesos rotos forman la base de las ramas, su cráneo, agrietado, está incrustado en el tronco y una fina capa de sangre seca cubre una corteza muy parecida a la piel.

languages.text: この木は人から直接生えたようだ…彼の折れた骨が枝の瘤となり、割れた頭蓋骨からは木の幹が生え、そして乾ききった内蔵には皮膚のような樹皮が薄く覆っている。
languages.original_text: This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

traits.locale_text: この木は人から直接生えたようだ――彼の折れた骨が枝の瘤となり、割れた頭蓋骨からは木の幹が生え、そして乾ききった内蔵には皮膚のような樹皮が薄く覆っている。

languages.text: Dieser Baum ist direkt aus einer Person gewachsen – die gebrochenen Knochen haben die Kränze von Ästen geformt, der eingeschlagene Schädel ist mit dem Stamm verwachsen, und die eingetrockneten Eingeweide überziehen jetzt in einer dünnen Schicht die hautähnliche Rinde.
languages.original_text: This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Baum ist direkt aus einer Person gewachsen – die gebrochenen Knochen haben die Kränze von Ästen geformt, der eingeschlagene Schädel ist mit dem Stamm verwachsen, und die eingetrockneten Eingeweide überziehen jetzt in einer dünnen Schicht die hautähnliche Rinde.

languages.text: Cet arbre a poussé à même un cadavre. Les branches se sont servies des os brisés comme de tuteurs, tandis que le crâne fendu a fusionné avec la base même du tronc. L'écorce est même recouverte d'une fine couche de sang séché.
languages.original_text: This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

traits.locale_text: Cet arbre a poussé à même un cadavre. Les branches se sont servies des os brisés comme de tuteurs, tandis que le crâne fendu a fusionné avec la base même du tronc. L'écorce est même recouverte d'une fine couche de sang séché.

languages.text: Bu ağaç, bir insanın içinden bitmiş. Kırık kemikleri, dalların köklerini oluşturmuş; çatlamış kafatası, gövdeyle bir olmuş ve deriye benzeyen kabuk, ince bir kurumuş kan tabakasıyla kaplanmış.
languages.original_text: This tree has sprouted right out of a person — his broken bones have formed the collars of branches, his cracked skull has merged with the trunk, and dried gore now coats the skin-like bark in a thin layer.

traits.locale_text: Bu ağaç bir insanın içinden bitmiş. Kırık kemikleri dalların köklerini oluşturmuş, çatlamış kafatası gövdeyle bir olmuş ve deriye benzeyen kabuk, ince bir kurumuş kan tabakasıyla kaplanmış.
